mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fire Hazards in Action Instruction Materials
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Fire Hazards in Action Instruction Materials, detailing how to show how fires can affect individuals in their homes and different methods of controlling them based on their nature, via various substances, automatic and manual fire control, etc.
